function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limitation of infrastructural capacity for 6G wireless technology due to different antenna and transceiver designs","Impact":"Delay in the roll-out of 6G technology, hindering the development of smart cities and communication systems","Mitigation":"Investment in R&D for new infrastructure designs, collaboration with industry stakeholders, and early planning for implementation","Technologies":"Advanced design and manufacturing technologies for smaller wavelengths, spectrum sharing technologies, and computational systems for 6G","People":"Telecommunication engineers, urban planners, and technology developers","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government agencies, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Increased network security challenges with the expansion of 6G technology and connectivity scope","Impact":"Potential vulnerabilities in smart city operations and communication systems, leading to disruptions and security breaches","Mitigation":"Deployment of advanced security architectures, encryption technologies, and continuous monitoring and updating of security measures","Technologies":"AI-based security systems, advanced encryption protocols, and real-time monitoring and threat detection systems","People":"Network security experts, AI developers, and urban infrastructure operators","Owner":"Government authorities, telecommunication companies, and cybersecurity firms"}]}
